sentence.Network_en: Her dancing brought loud cheers, wolf whistles and applause.

sentence.Network_en: They wolf-whistled at me, and I was so embarrassed I tripped up.

sentence.Network_en: The wolf clawed at the tree and howled the whole night.
sentence.Network_cn: 这匹狼用爪子挠着树，嚎叫了整晚。

jx.jx_en_mean: call for help when it is not needed, with the effect that one is not believed when one really does need help

phrase.cizu_name: hold (或 have) a wolf by the ears
keep the wolf from the door

jx.jx_en_mean: have enough money to avert hunger or starvation (used hyperbolically)

lj.lj_ly: I work part-time to pay the mortgage and keep the wolf from the door.
lj.lj_ls: 我做兼职是为了偿还购房抵押贷款，还有免于挨饿。

jx.jx_en_mean: leave someone to be roughly treated or criticized without trying to help or defend them
jx.jx_cn_mean: 弃某人于危险（或困境）而不顾

jx.jx_en_mean: a person or thing that appears friendly or harmless but is really hostile
jx.jx_cn_mean: 披着羊皮的狼，伪装友善的敌人

jx.jx_en_mean: To avoid the privation and suffering resulting from a lack of money
jx.jx_cn_mean: 免于穷困：为避免穷困和由于缺钱而造成的痛苦

lj.lj_ly: Both spouses had to take jobs in order to keep the wolf from the door.
lj.lj_ls: 为避免受饥寒之苦，夫妻俩不得不双双工作

phrase.cizu_name: keep the wolf from the door&I{【俚语】}

jx.jx_en_mean: One who feigns congeniality while actually holding malevolent intentions.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 披着羊皮的狼：假装意气相投但实际上怀着恶毒意图的人

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English wulf, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch wolf and German Wolf, from an Indo-European root shared by Latin lupus and Greek lukos. The verb dates from the mid 19th cent

encyclopedia.content: 1.美国电影《wolf》基本信息 中文名称：狼人 英文名称：Wolf 上 映： 1994年06月17日 ( 美国 ) 地 区： 美国 ( 拍摄地 ) 对 白： 英语 颜 色： 彩色 时 长： 125 分钟 类 型： 剧情 恐怖 爱情 惊悚 分 级： 瑞典：15 英国：15 西班牙：13 澳大利亚：M 芬兰：K-16 阿根廷：16 智利：14 挪威：15 美国：R演职员详表 导 演： 迈克·尼科尔斯 Mike Nichols 主 演： 杰克·尼科尔森 Jack Nicholson 米歇尔·法伊弗 Michelle Pfeiffer

entry.def: A wolf is a wild animal that looks like a large dog.
If someone wolfs their food, they eat it all very quickly and greedily.

example.ex: I was back in the changing room wolfing tea and sandwiches.
example.tran: 我回到更衣室，狼吞虎咽地喝茶、吃三明治。

entry.def: If someone cries wolf, they say that there is a problem when there is not, with the result that people do not believe them when there really is a problem.
If you keep the wolf from the door, you succeed in providing food and other necessary things for yourself or your family.

example.ex: A lot of the lads took small jobs to help keep the wolf from the door.
example.tran: 很多少年打零工帮补家里维持生计。

means.word_mean: 1. any of various predatory carnivorous canine mammals of North America and Eurasia that usually hunt in packs
2. a man who is aggressive in making amorous advances to women

Sentence.sentence: Some communities have even discussed the possibility of bringing wolves back into the ecological mix.
That means wolves in the suburbs of New York
The wolves would kill deer of course.

sentences.en: The wolf snapped at the hunter's hand.
